snippet: Japan finds itself surrounded by a worsening security environment as North Korea pushes forward with missile development and China and Russia step up military activity in the region, Japan's Defence Ministry said on Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: Japan's Security Fears Grow as Neighbours Build Up Arms
headline.main: Japan's Security Fears Grow as Neighbours Build Up Arms

lead_paragraph: Japan finds itself surrounded by a worsening security environment as North Korea pushes forward with missile development and China and Russia step up military activity in the region, Japan's Defence Ministry said on Tuesday.
